title: How can philosophy help students? - Quora

response.answer_text: Philosophy helps you figure out the hardest problems most others can not solve such as Is short term freedom the same as long term enslavement?Is risk a good rationale for ownership?Why does deficit thinking create more scarcity?Are current structures of demand and supply sustainable?What are the implications of responsibility and is there such a thing as obscenity of responsibility, where the law essentially creates a neurotic stalking culture that destroys the economy and common sense? (Aka it would not hold up in court to itself)Why do fascist economies collapse?Why can some people not transcend zero sum, sacrificial thinking?
It helps the ability to think logically.To analyze and solve problems.To assess proposed solutions.To write and speak clearly, attending to details.
